biography.summary: Jeff Merkley is the Democratic U.S. Senator from Oregon, serving since 2009. He has focused on health care reform, climate action, and governing with a progressive approach to public policy.

contact.office_address: 531 Hart Senate Office Building, Washington DC 20510

policy_positions.stance: Support expanding access to affordable health coverage and protecting people with preexisting conditions.
Support aggressive action to reduce emissions and expand clean energy investments.

bills_sponsored.title: S. 1234 - Clean Energy for All Act
bills_sponsored.summary: A bill to promote clean energy development, increase energy efficiency, and reduce greenhouse gas emissions.

bills_sponsored.title: S. 5678 - Health Care for All Act
bills_sponsored.summary: A bill to expand health care coverage in Oregon and nationwide, strengthening protections for patients.

timeline.event: Elected to U.S. Senate, taking office in 2009.
